channel.title: How to rename everything?
channel.description:
Hello. I got xx-scape and a dragonscape 525 client/source. But i wan't to rename everything in the game like when i click on logout button it says ''Click here to logout safely from xx-scape'' And when i log in i see bunch of stuff like ''Go to www.thisforum.com etc''
Its a 525 dragonscape server.

item.title: How to rename everything?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

This would all be server-sided. Sorry, your not gonna get much help for a server-sided issue here.

Read full topic

item.title: How to rename everything?

item.description:

Hello.

But i wan’t to rename everything in the game like when i click on logout button it says ‘‘Click here to logout safely from xx-scape’’
And when i log in i see bunch of stuff like ‘‘Go to www.thisforum.com etc’’
